text: DON'T MISS 'I'm being threatened and the kids are getting picked on': 'Terrified' Danielle Lloyd reveals the impact ex Jamie O'Hara's CBB stint is having on her family PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Jailhouse shock! Downcast Lauren Goodger looks emotional as she exits prison after visiting her violent convict boyfriend Keeping everyone guessing! Bikini-clad Mel, 46, shows off the VERY toned results of her gruelling week at bootcamp in series of stunning snaps 'Where's his wedding ring?' Nicola McLean's husband Tom Williams leaves a London restaurant with mystery brunette as his wife remains in CBB house Katie Price recreates Dolly Parton's hit 9 To 5 as she dons blonde wig and bright pink ensemble on Lip Sync Battle... after performing Black Eyed Peas' song Flying high? Bleary-eyed Kate Moss puffs on suspicious-looking cigarette in private jet's cockpit... after looking worse for wear at 43rd birthday bash Bella Thorne flaunts her sizzling figure in bikini while clutching a pig... after shocking Twitter by sharing a snap of her ex Gregg Sulkin's 'manhood' Curvy catwalk queen Iskra Lawrence flaunts her voluptuous figure and toned abs in skintight crop top as she hits the town in LA Hailey Baldwin and Zayn Malik slip into their best red carpet looks as they film cameos for Ocean's 8 movie in New York All star cast Bottoms up! Vampy Rita Ora gets cheeky in a TINY black dress and thigh-high boots on the set of new movie Wonderwell in Rome Loved-up Vicky Pattison oozes sophistication in floor-length peach frock as she enjoys date night with new beau John Noble in London She's FERRY shocked! CBB's Chloe bursts into a fit of giggles as her eye-popping assets pop out of her dress during watermelon game 'It could have been a different story': TOWIE's Danielle Armstrong reveals she has 'abnormal cells' as she urges fans to get a smear test Ex On The Beach's Zahida Allen enjoys a smooch with boyfriend Sean Pratt AND love rival Maisie Gillespie... after they competed for his affections on show It's Aunty Oh Na Na! Doting Rihanna babysits her cute toddler cousin Majesty as she takes her for a trip to a New York toy store Glum Scott Disick emerges as it's claimed ex Kourtney Kardashian wants to give their nine-year romance another chance... 18 months after split Hippie chic! Make-up free Drew Barrymore swaps glamour for grunge as she jets in to Paris sporting baggy maxi dress and floppy hat Tat's not all, folks! Laurence Fox shows off new 'E' tattoo behind his ear dedicated to son Eugene... after unveiling large rose inking on arm Back to haunt him! Ryan Gosling, 16, is far removed from heart-throb status as he rocks bowl cut for appearance on kid's horror show Goosebumps 'We're surprised she showed up': Kim Kardashian 'shocked production staff by filming cameo in heist film Ocean's 8'... after revealing terror of her own robbery ordeal What will Bella say? Kylie Jenner puts on a busty display in racy outfit as she enjoys a night out with BFF's ex The Weeknd and her boyfriend Tyga Going for gold! Nicole Richie looks sartorially savvy in metallic blouse and slinky maxi-skirt as she parties at vodka bash Disco fever 'It was a mutual decision, there are no hard feelings': Caroline Flack 'splits from beau Blue Logan'... three months after publicly debuting romance TOWIE's Georgia Kousoulou flaunts her toned and tanned bikini body as she shares snaps from romantic Mexican getaway with Tommy Mallet 'I won't say I love it!' John McCririck is left unimpressed as he swaps wacky style for clean-cut 'hipster' make-under on Celebrity 100% Hotter Call the Midwife's Jack Ashton admits it's 'confusing' dating co-star Helen George after their characters split on the show Simon Cowell, Alesha Dixon, Amanda Holden and David Walliams resume BGT duties as they join Ant and Dec on luxury private jet... for trip to Blackpool Feeling fur-bulous! Jennifer Lopez cuts a dramatic figure in huge fluffy coat as she hits hotspot Catch LA All dressed up for her night out Mel B flaunts her incredible curves in a micro-mini dress as she steps out in NYC... while the future of Spice Girls off-shoot GEM hangs in the balance 'This is what you call a REAL girl!': Chloe Ferry shocks half of Jedward as she rubs her NAKED BOTTOM against horrified John Grimes Avert your eyes! Lizzie Cundy goes underwear-free as she flaunts her trim figure in VERY racy thigh-split dress at theatre bash Daring to bare Waitress is the spitting image of pop superstar Ariana Grande (and even the singer herself can't believe how uncanny the similarity is) Tat-two can play at that game! Zayn Malik boasts new 'love' inking on his hand... after his girlfriend Gigi Hadid flashed band on her wedding finger Shady lady! Cool cat Gigi Hadid wears sunglasses in the dark as she goes for a stroll in green fur coat... and hides ring finger amid engagement rumours Look away now, Cheryl! Daddy-to-be Liam Payne offers one lucky fan a date with him in a fancy restaurant in Malibu What an offer Pregnant Amanda Seyfried shows off baby bump as she and fiance Thomas Sadoski take their dog for a walk Announced she was expecting in November Knee bother? Kristen Stewart shows off nasty scrapes on her leg in ripped jeans as she jets into Los Angeles She has always been something of a tomboy 'I'm gutted... but at least I'll see my wife': James Jordan becomes the fourth person to be axed from the CBB house in surprise eviction 'I've spoken to her': EOTB star Joshua Ritchie claims he has been in contact with Stephanie Davis... after claiming he could be her newborn son's father PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Pregnant Binky Felstead and on/off beau JP cosy up on shopping trip for their unborn child... as they are seen for first time since news broke What would Alex Dunphy think? Ariel Winter, 18, wears a revealing corset and SMOKES during night out in Sydney with beau Levi Meaden Game-changer! Dannii Minogue vows new talent show Let It Shine will be a world away from the 'nasty judge' moments on X Factor Kendall Jenner flaunts her endless legs in skintight leather pants as she shops in NYC with rumoured love interest A$AP Rocky Trim Davina McCall unveils her new sugar-free cookbook and proves that you can look as good as her by eating curry, chocolate and PIE Step aside Emma Stone!
